cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)S E C R E T.CP. 14-6 (52), Copy No. CjCABINET. TRADE YTETH RUSSIA.Note by the Secretary, Cabinet.At their Meeting on April 27th, 1932 (Cabinet 25 (32) Conclusion 7) the Cabinet agreed (Conclusion 7 (a)) that the President of the Board of Trade should be authorised to allow the Overseas Trade Department to take action for the present within the limits of the Treasury proposal as set out in the Second Report of the Cabinet Committee on Trade with Russia (CP. 141 (32) paragraph 10), but that this decision should be subject^ inter alia, to the approval of the Chancellor of the Exchequer.The Chancellor of the Exchequer has now informed me that he has approved Conclusion 7 (a) of Cabinet 25 (52).-(Signed) Mo P. A. HANKEY. Secretaryp Cabinet,2, Whitehall Gardens.. 29th April, 1932.
